direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve creating permission-related messages but in different directions (request vs. response).
Both methods handle permission-related errors and create corresponding error responses.
Both methods create response messages with specific attributes and similar control flows.

enhanced_by.reason: The request method can be used to set up the initial state for testing the response creation.
The binding response method can be used to ensure the environment is correctly set up before creating the permission response.
The error response method can be used to verify the handling of exceptions and error conditions in the permission response creation.
